settings.text: Programs designed to accelerate your leadership
Whether you are a solo leader or building a high-performing team, there is a Catalyst program for where you are right now.

settings.title: Three ways to work together
settings.description: Every engagement is tailored to your goals, timeline, and context. Here are our core offerings.

settings.title: 1-on-1 Executive Coaching
settings.description:
Private coaching sessions designed around your leadership challenges. We work together to build clarity, confidence, and a concrete action plan you can execute immediately.

What's included:

Bi-weekly 60-minute sessions
Personality and strengths assessments
Action plans with accountability
Email support between sessions

settings.title: Leadership Retreats
settings.description:
An immersive two-day experience for leadership teams who need to step back, see the big picture, and realign around what matters most.

What's included:

2-day intensive experience
Small group (6-8 leaders)
Facilitated workshops
90-day follow-up coaching

settings.title: Team Alignment Workshops
settings.description:
Facilitated sessions that surface the real dynamics on your team and create shared commitments for moving forward together.

What's included:

Half-day or full-day format
Team dynamics assessment
Conflict resolution framework
Shared goals and commitments

settings.title: Choose your level
settings.description: Transparent pricing for every stage of your leadership journey.

settings.title: Catalyst Starter
settings.features:
+ 2 sessions per month
+ Goal-setting framework
+ Email support
+ Monthly progress review

settings.title: Catalyst Growth
settings.features:
+ 4 sessions per month
+ Comprehensive assessments
+ Priority scheduling
+ Slack access for quick questions
+ Quarterly strategy session

settings.title: Catalyst Enterprise
settings.features:
+ Team coaching program
+ On-site workshops
+ Leadership retreats
+ Culture assessment
+ Dedicated support team

settings.title: Frequently asked questions
settings.description: Everything you need to know before getting started with coaching.

settings.question: How long is a typical coaching engagement?
settings.answer: Most clients work with me for 6 to 12 months, though some engagements are shorter or longer depending on goals. We will discuss the right timeline during your discovery call and adjust as you make progress.

settings.question: What is your coaching style?
settings.answer: I use a Socratic approach combined with accountability. That means I ask powerful questions to help you think differently, then we create structures to ensure you follow through. Expect to be challenged and supported in equal measure.

settings.question: Do you work with teams?
settings.answer: Yes. In addition to 1-on-1 executive coaching, I offer dedicated team programs including alignment workshops, leadership retreats, and multi-month culture reset engagements. These are customized to your team's specific needs.

settings.question: What results can I expect?
settings.answer: Clients typically experience greater clarity in decision-making, improved confidence in difficult conversations, stronger team dynamics, and measurable progress on their most important goals. 94% of clients achieve their primary coaching objectives.

settings.question: How do I get started?
settings.answer: It starts with a free 30-minute discovery call where we discuss your goals and challenges. From there, I will recommend the best program and we will do a mutual fit assessment before beginning. No pressure, no pitch.

settings.text: Ready to invest in your leadership?
Book a free discovery call and let's find the right program for where you are right now.
